ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَٰرِهِمْ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰفِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the people whose hearts, hearing and sight Allah has sealed up. They are the unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are the ones whose hearts and ears and eyes have been sealed by God; and these are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They are the ones upon whose hearts and hearing and eyes Allah has set a seal. They are utterly steeped in heedlessness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has sealed their hearts, ears and eyes and they are not aware of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are the ones whose hearts, ears, and eyes Allah has sealed; and they are the neglectful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those upon whose hearts, hearing (ears) and sight (eyes) Allah has set a seal over. And they are the heedless!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they on whose hearts and their hearing and their eyes Allah has set a seal, and these are the heedless ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those -- God has set a seal on their hearts, and their hearing, and their eyes, and those -- they are the heedless ones;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such are they whose hearts and ears and eyes Allah hath sealed. And such are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: These are the ones upon whose hearts and hearing and sight God has set a seal. It is they who are heedless,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are they upon whose hearts and hearing and sight Allah hath set a seal; and these! they are the negligent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the ones Allah has set a seal on their hearts, their hearing and their sight, and it is they who are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those are they whose hearts, ears, and eyes Allah has sealed up, and they take no heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those upon whose hearts, hearing (ears) and sight (eyes) Allah has set a seal. And they are the heedless!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They are those whose hearts, hearing and sight are sealed by Allah; they are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is they whom God has sealed their hearts, and their hearing, and their sight. It is they who are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:108] They are the ones on whose hearts God has set a seal, and on their hearing and their sight [as well], and it is they who are heedless, of what [punishment] is being prepared for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such are they whose hearts and ears and eyes Allah hath sealed. And such are the heedless) of the Hereafter and further shun it; it is also said that this means: they are heedless of Allah's divine Oneness, and deniers of it.
